    import Ethereum from 'coinme-node/js/money/Ethereum.js'
    public class | source

    Ethereum

    Extends:

    js/Ember.js~Ember.Object → CoreObject → Currency → Ethereum

    Represents the Ethereum currency in memory.

    This class cannot be instantiated. Everything is static and the constructor throws, so treat it like a singleton.

    Static Method Summary

    Static Public Methods
    public static

    fromEthereum(valueInEthereum: Money | String | Number | null | undefined): Money

    public static

    isEthereum(moneyOrCurrency: Money | Currency | Class<Currency>): Boolean

    Detects if you pass in either Money or Currency of type Ethereum

    Ethereum -> true
    money<Ethereum> -> true

    public static

    shouldBeEthereum(moneyOrCurrency: Money | Currency | Class<Currency>): Class<Currency>

    If Ethereum#isEthereum returns false, will throw.
    public static

    toString(): string
